# Data Import

```{r}
files <- 
  list.files(
    system.file("extdata", package = "IPO2"), 
    pattern = "01|02", 
    full.names = TRUE
  )
raw_data <- MSnbase::readMSData(files = files, mode = "onDisk")
raw_data <- MSnbase::filterRt(raw_data, rt = c(100, 200))
```
